mapper.select: select dno,giver_name,taker_name,DONATE_DATE,amount from( SELECT ROWNUM as dno,m1.NICK_NAME as giver_name,m2.NICK_NAME as taker_name,d.DONATE_DATE as DONATE_DATE,d.DONATE_AMOUNT as amount FROM DONATE d join MEMBER m1 on (d.GIVER_NO=m1.user_no) join MEMBER m2 on (d.takER_NO=m2.user_no) ) where dno BETWEEN 1+20*(#{_int}-1) and 20+20*(#{_int}-1) order by 1

SELECT dno,giver_name,taker_name,DONATE_DATE,amount FROM( SELECT rownum as dno,m1.NICK_NAME as giver_name,m2.NICK_NAME as taker_name,d.DONATE_DATE as DONATE_DATE,d.DONATE_AMOUNT as amount FROM DONATE d join MEMBER m1 on (d.GIVER_NO=m1.user_no) join MEMBER m2 on (d.takER_NO=m2.user_no) where taker_name=#{searchval}) where dno BETWEEN 1+20*(#{page}-1) and 20+20*(#{page}-1) order BY 1

SELECT ROWNUM,TAKER_NAME,AMOUNT FROM (SELECT M.NICK_NAME AS TAKER_NAME,SUM(D.DONATE_AMOUNT) AS AMOUNT FROM DONATE D JOIN MEMBER M ON (D.TAKER_NO=M.USER_NO)GROUP BY M.NICK_NAME) WHERE TAKER_NAME=#{taker_name}

SELECT ROWNUM,GIVER_NAME,AMOUNT FROM (SELECT M.NICK_NAME AS GIVER_NAME,SUM(D.DONATE_AMOUNT) AS AMOUNT FROM DONATE D JOIN MEMBER M ON (D.GIVER_NO=M.USER_NO)GROUP BY M.NICK_NAME) WHERE GIVER_NAME=#{giver_name}
